A

ABSTRACT_CONSISTENT - dev.progress4j.api.ProgressReport.Units
Units of work that don't have any particular meaning, but in which each unit takes roughly the same amount of time to process.
ABSTRACT_INCONSISTENT - dev.progress4j.api.ProgressReport.Units
Units of work that don't have any particular meaning, and in which steps in the operation may take varying amounts of time.

B

BYTES - dev.progress4j.api.ProgressReport.Units
Work that's measured in bytes.

I

immutableReport() - Method in interface dev.progress4j.api.ProgressReport
Returns an immutable version of the progress report.
increment(long) - Method in interface dev.progress4j.api.MutableProgressReport
Increments the completed work by value, capped to ProgressReport.getExpectedTotal()}.

M

MutableProgressReport - Interface in dev.progress4j.api
A specialization of ProgressReport that allows changing the contents of the report, which is useful for managing progress in tight loops without flooding the GC with new small objects.
mutableReport() - Method in interface dev.progress4j.api.ProgressReport
Returns a mutable copy of the progress report.

P

ProgressReport - Interface in dev.progress4j.api
Exposes the progress of some operation independent of the details of how it's presented.
ProgressReport.Trackable - Interface in dev.progress4j.api
An object that generates progress reports.
ProgressReport.Tracker - Interface in dev.progress4j.api
An object that receives progress reports from some other code that generates them.
ProgressReport.Units - Enum in dev.progress4j.api
What the units are for ProgressReport.getCompleted() and ProgressReport.getExpectedTotal().
